title: Learning with Kernels: support vector machines, regularization, optimization, and beyond
venue: Adaptive computation and machine learning series

tldr.text: Learning with Kernels provides an introduction to SVMs and related kernel methods that provide all of the concepts necessary to enable a reader equipped with some basic mathematical knowledge to enter the world of machine learning using theoretically well-founded yet easy-to-use kernel algorithms.
